references.paper_title: Segnet: A deep convolutional encoder-decoder architecture for image segmentation.
references.reason: This paper introduces SegNet, a foundational deep learning architecture for image segmentation and is highly cited in the field of medical image analysis.
This paper introduces the Segment Anything Model (SAM), a novel model for image segmentation.

references.paper_title: A survey on deep learning in medical image analysis.
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning techniques applied to medical image analysis.

references.paper_title: LORA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models.
references.reason: This paper introduces Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA), a parameter-efficient fine-tuning method for large language models that serves as a baseline in the current paper.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation.
references.reason: This paper introduces U-Net, a widely used convolutional neural network architecture for biomedical image segmentation, against which the present paper compares its results.
